preference.name: SUBSCMPL_cmd_always_send_blank
preference.preference_description: Decides if a blank IPC 1755 XML document is sent to vendors on the first and all subsequent requests. Valid values are: * true: A blank IPC 1755 XML document is sent to vendors on the first and all subsequent requests. * false: A blank IPC 1755 XML document is sent on the first request, and the most recently received IPC 1755 XML document on subsequent requests. This is the default value.
